edu.matc.controller

Class ShowResults

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • edu.matc.controller.ShowResults
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="showResults",
            urlPatterns="/showResults")
public class ShowResults
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This is the ShowResults servlet. It will call the API using the form date, create a list of result objects, set the page title and forward to the results.jsp page.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
